Reviews.Title: “Brilliant - if you're in Berlin, stay here!”
Reviews.Author: Danielle S
Reviews.Content: hotel fab location close zoo station zoo plus shops kudam easy reach historical bits city via sbahn etcthe hotel modern enormous stayed fantastic showers tv mini kitchen facilities huge walk wardrobe cant value stay

Reviews.Title: “Goethe87: still good, but with a few problems to sort out.”
Reviews.Author: Elwall
Reviews.Content: stayed ago rated 5 stars time 4 yes value apartments modern pleasant obviously welllocated issues housekeeping stayed 5 nights apartment serviced properly ranged major servicing day minor removal set towels leaving set 2 people additionally little friendliness front desk nice realised building airconditioned fan doesnt wed stay time id hope housekeeping issues rectified

Reviews.Title: “Deserves the great reviews but ignore the photos on their own website!”
Reviews.Author: tiggerandpooh
Reviews.Content: stay 87 careful book type apartment photo website description studio simply nice hotel little kitchenette entrance sofa dining table little desk square table little nook corner suitable raised arrived immediately upgraded added photos size dining table armchair walk wardrobe plus size kitchenette microwave hob fridge toaster coffee maker kettle french windows added feeling luxury space tea coffee sugar salt pepper provided umbrellas provided guests space décor – modern boutique hotel feel spotlessly clean bed 2 twin mattresses particularly luxurious hard thin duvets hotel warm wasn’t thin pillow bring own lines towels bit thin worn didn’t match luxurious décor boutique style bathroom shower massage jets – fabulous didn’t detract quality stay extremely value money gentleman reception helpful albeit pops cigarette break frequently leaving notice door gone minutes handy seen arrived breakfast 14 euros chose supermarket ten minute walk cater ourselves breakfast looked trendy total journey berlin schoenefeld airport hotel approx 1 half hours platform 13 s9 direction change platform 4 direction spandau easy 10 min walk garten station hotel situated quiet street lovely charlottenburg bookshops traditional crafts tailors beautiful fashioned plenty cosy modern cafes restaurants doorstep wish we’d try

Reviews.Title: “Good choice in Berlin Charlottenburg”
Reviews.Author: Fernleigh1
Reviews.Content: spent 5 nights middecember studio overlooking interior courtyard contemporary albeit spare furnishings comfortable space king bed fainting sofa table chairs eating equipped kitchenette nice bathroom walkin shower tub immaculate real issue soso wifi service signal strong throughput sluggish staff professional accommodating hotel steps major street quick bus access zoo bahnhof charlottenburg lost bit charm shops restaurants close including attractions savignyplatz definitely return

HotelInfo.Name: Apartmenthaus Goeth87
HotelInfo.Address: Goethestrasse 87, 10623 Berlin, Germany
